about.title: Revolutionizing
about.description: Ticket Safe was born from a simple belief: ticket resale must be safe, legal, and transparent for the student community. We provide a trusted marketplace where verified students can buy and sell tickets securely.
about.missionText: Enable students to buy and sell their event tickets safely and legally, through a trusted platform with verified users, fraud prevention, and secure payments—giving students the freedom to set fair prices.
about.safetyDesc: All tickets are verified to ensure authenticity, and only verified students can join the platform—preventing scams and ensuring a trustworthy community.
about.communityDesc: Exclusively for verified university students (like ESCP), creating a safe and transparent marketplace among peers.
about.experienceDesc: Smooth interface, secure payments, and responsive support—making buying and selling tickets fast and easy.
about.transparencyDesc: Fair and transparent pricing set by students themselves
about.securityDesc: Protected payments and verified student community
about.authenticityDesc: All tickets verified to ensure legitimacy—no fakes

contact.faq1Q: How do I verify my university email?
contact.faq1A: Simply sign up with your university email address. We automatically verify university domains.
contact.faq2Q: How does the escrow system work?
contact.faq2A: When you purchase a ticket, the payment is held securely until you confirm receipt of the ticket. This protects both buyers and sellers.
contact.faq3A: Students can freely set their own resale prices. We encourage fair and reasonable pricing to maintain trust within our student community.
contact.faq4A: Yes! We use industry-standard encryption and secure payment processing through trusted providers.
